description.lang: Aspire RF Dimmers replace regular switches to provide local and remoteON/OFF/DIM/BRIGHT control and are compatible with Incandescent, Magnetic Low-Voltage, Electronic Low-Voltage, LED, CFL and FLR lighting loads. Aspire RF Dimmers provide other programmable functions (scenes, events, association, child lockout, etc.) when used with Aspire RF or other Z-Wave compliant controllers*. Each dimmer can be manually and remotely controlled by commands sent from an Aspire RF controller (RFTDCSG, RFHDCSG, RFTCP) or other Z-Wave compatible controllers or programs. Aspire RF Dimmers utilize existing 120 V/AC 60Hz standard house wiring and fit into standard wallboxes. No new wiring needed.

deviceDescription.brandName: ASPIRE RF Wireless by Eaton Wiring
